{{Infobox Peripheral NOS |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = ZALMAN |model = ZM-VE300 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/10/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ZALMAN ZM-VE300 |sernum = |wlclass = |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |if_connector_type = Female Micro-B |form_factor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Fujitsu;MB86C311B;TAIWAN, MB86C311B, 1314 B95, E2, ARM; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = 8-bit PIC MCU;Microchip;PIC16F1829;PIC16F1829, VSS(e2), 122366V;1; ,,, SPI Flash (8 Mbit);Eon;F80-100HCP;;1; |flags = |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = USB 2.5" HDD enclosure (SATA), USB virtual Optical Disk Drive (ODD) emulator |availability = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 823884202946 |ean = 8809213763168 |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B007B5Y51C |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |manuf_country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "www.iodd.co.kr", "Designed by CNS co., ltd", and "iodd2531-rev1.55-FAB15-2013.04-12" is silkscreened on the board in the images shown below. :.. which would seem to indicate this is an '''iodd''' iodd2531. ===SKUs === *'''Silver''' model (ZM-VE300-S): UPC: 823884202946, EAN: 8809213763168, ASIN: B007B5Y51C *'''Black''' model (ZM-VE300-B): UPC: 823884202953, ASIN: B007B5Y4BI ===Chips used === * Microchip PIC16F1829 * Fujitsu MB86C311B (ARM) * Eon F80-100HCP (SPI Flash 1MB) ===Mo' info === 
Dimensions 	135.3(L) x 78.6(W) x 13.1(H) mm
Weight 	96g
Materials 	Aluminum Alloy, Acryl, Poly Carbonate
External Interface:
* USB1.1 Max. 12Mbps
* USB2.0 Max. 480Mbps
* USB3.0 Max. 5.0Gbps
Internal Interface: S-ATA I/II
Compatible HDD Size 	2.5"(9.5mm HDD/SSD)
Power 	Input: DC 5V
Supported OS 	Windows 98, ME, 2000, XP, VISTA, 7 / Mac OS / Linux
Color 	Black/Silver
